document.discussion_title: How Quad Citians can help Louisiana flood victims - Story
document.topic_text: How Quad Citians can help Louisiana flood victims Published 08/21 2016 05:56PM Updated 08/21 2016 05:56PM Copyright 2016 Nexstar Broadcasting, Inc. All rights reserved. This material may not be published, broadcast, rewritten, or redistributed. The LeClaire Civic Club is sponsoring a Louisiana Flood Relief Campaign. Donations will be accepted at the Iowa and Illinois Blackhawk Bank & Trust locations or LeClaire Civic Club, 127 S. Cody Road, LeClaire, Iowa. Blackhawk Bank & Trust is accepting donations during normal business hours. The LeClaire Civic Club will be accepting donations August 22nd to 26th at the LeClaire Civic Center from 10am to 7pm. Monetary donations can be made at Blackhawk Bank & Trust locations in both Iowa and Illinois. People wishing to make a donation online go to http://www.gofundme.com/2jtlzss . Checks should be made payable to: Le Claire Civic Club Flood Relief. Contact Dan Morrell at 563-579-4126 with questions. Items of greatest need include cleaning supplies, hygiene products, bottled water, non-perishable food items, linens, new underwear, and new socks. Here is a detailed list of what's needed: Cleaning Products
